alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:20PM EDT until May 16 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Talbot County in eastern Maryland... Southern Caroline County in eastern Maryland... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 520 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Breezy Point, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Easton, Federalsburg, Trappe, Preston, Oxford, Choptank, Tilghman Island, Hambleton and Windyhill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
